trends: There have been no other sightings in Niagara-on-the-Lake
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from Niagara Falls, just turning onto Glendale Ave. When the cd player was affected and skipped. As we turned onto Glendale Ave. the object proceeded to go over the car. I was driving while my wife and child were watching the object. It then disappeared almost right after it had gone over the car as I was driving down Glendale Ave.
